00016 #include "CSMA802154.h"
00017 
00018 #include <cassert>
00019 
00020 #include "DeciderResult802154Narrow.h"
00021 #include "Decider802154Narrow.h"
00022 #include "PhyToMacControlInfo.h"
00023 #include "MacToNetwControlInfo.h"
00024 #include "MacPkt_m.h"
00025 
00026 Define_Module(CSMA802154);
00027 
00028 
00029 void CSMA802154::initialize(int stage)
00030 {
00031   csma::initialize(stage);
00032 }
00033 
00034 cPacket *CSMA802154::decapsMsg(MacPkt * macPkt) {
00035 
00036   cPacket * msg = csma::decapsMsg(macPkt);
00037 
00038   // get bit error rate
00039   PhyToMacControlInfo* cinfo = static_cast<PhyToMacControlInfo*> (macPkt->getControlInfo());
00040   const DeciderResult802154Narrow* result = static_cast<const DeciderResult802154Narrow*> (cinfo->getDeciderResult());
00041   double ber = result->getBER();
00042   double rssi = result->getRSSI();
00043 
00044   //get control info attached by base class decapsMsg method
00045   //and set its rssi and ber
00046   assert(dynamic_cast<MacToNetwControlInfo*>(msg->getControlInfo()));
00047   MacToNetwControlInfo* cInfo = static_cast<MacToNetwControlInfo*>(msg->getControlInfo());
00048   cInfo->setBitErrorRate(ber);
00049   cInfo->setRSSI(rssi);
00050 
00051   return msg;
00052 }
00053 
00054 void CSMA802154::handleLowerControl(cMessage *msg) {
00055   if (msg->getKind() == Decider802154Narrow::RECEPTION_STARTED) {
00056     debugEV<< "control message: RECEIVING AirFrame" << endl;
00057     delete msg;
00058     return;
00059   }
00060   csma::handleLowerControl(msg);
00061 }
